properties.description: SPACE OPENING ON 17th November 2023** Open to all. Accessible to pushchairs, wheelchairs and small scooters. Runs on Fridays 10.00-14.30 from 17th November until Easter. Free hot or cold drinks, biscuits and also sandwiches at lunchtime. Games, toys, books and magazines available or just sit and chat. Feel free to bring your own craftwork or knitting. Quiet room for reading. Free internet. On "The Keyworth" bus route. Community bus transport available on request.
properties.title: Friday Warm Welcome Space

properties.description: Infusion is open as a warm space every Tuesday to Friday from 10:30am until 3pm. Free Wi-Fi, Device Charging, People to chat to, stay as long as you want during opening, Pay it forward/suspended coffee scheme, space to work, Food/Drink for sale
properties.title: Infusion Coffee House & Community Space
